Table	Create Table
users	CREATE TABLE `users` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `tenantId` varchar(36) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `openId` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `name` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `email` varchar(320) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `passwordHash` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `loginMethod` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `role` enum('owner','collaborator','restricted','admin','user') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'user',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `lastSignedIn` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `twoFactorSecret` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `twoFactorEnabled` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `backupCodes` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `passwordResetToken` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `passwordResetExpires` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `disabled` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  UNIQUE KEY `users_openId_unique` (`openId`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
